Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>
Entry.EnglishText: <Dio>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Couleur>
Entry.EnglishText: <Couleur>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mel>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mel>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Rondoline>
Entry.EnglishText: <Rondoline>

Entry.JapaneseText: アルベルト
Entry.EnglishText: Albert

Entry.JapaneseText: <Suzu>
Entry.EnglishText: <Suzu>

Entry.JapaneseText: Variable
Entry.EnglishText: Variable

Entry.JapaneseText: オレらが牢屋に捕まってる間、 のんびり温泉つかりやがって！
Entry.EnglishText: Let's get this straight. While I was rotting in a cell you were ENJOYING THE SPA?

Entry.JapaneseText: クルルルルゥ〜？
Entry.EnglishText: Kuruuuru?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Couleur>に怒っても仕方ないよ
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, there's no use getting mad with <Couleur> now.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうそう。 いい湯加減で気持ちよかったよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, plus, the water temperature was perfect, wouldn't you agree fur ball?

Entry.JapaneseText: クールール〜ン♪
Entry.EnglishText: Kuruuruuun!

Entry.JapaneseText: ロ、<Rody>まで オレらをほうって……？
Entry.EnglishText: <Rody> betrayed us too...!?

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、あの時は君たちが 捕まってるなんて知らなかったし
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I didn't know you were in prison at that time so I thought it'd be a waste not to!

Entry.JapaneseText: おらも温泉入りてぇだーよ。 ふくろだぬきが入ったなんて許せないだ
Entry.EnglishText: I want to go to the hot springs too! But even if we return I obviously can't take a dip. How unfair!

Entry.JapaneseText: うちのお湯は酸性なので、 金具が錆びてしまうかもしれません
Entry.EnglishText: The waters inside my residence are quite acidic but the metal fittings never rust at all. I believe you'll be ok.

Entry.JapaneseText: それに湿気で腐っちゃうかもだしね
Entry.EnglishText: In that case, let's get real wet!

Entry.JapaneseText: やんだやんだぁ。おらも<Mel><Mel>と<Rody>たんと ミーたまと<Suzu>ちんと一緒に温泉入りてぇだ〜よ
Entry.EnglishText: It's settled! I'll take a bath with <Mel>-<Mel>, Miss <Rody>, <Mint>y and Lil' <Suzu> with lots of love!

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら、腐ったまま、 二度と湯からあがってくんな！
Entry.EnglishText: But if you enter there won't be space for anyone else and you'll drown like the pervert you are!

Entry.JapaneseText: そういう<Dio>こそ、 入らないの？
Entry.EnglishText: Why don't you take a bath with us instead?

Entry.JapaneseText: え？ オレは……遠慮しとく。 あはは……
Entry.EnglishText: What? That's...I must go. Hahahahaha.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>…… お風呂が嫌いなんです……
Entry.EnglishText: You really do hate baths that much, huh?
